desc: CROWN/ARMOR is an all-natural spray solution for surface and face mask disinfection. Our spray provides a 99.9% barrier against viruses and is best for reducing infection risk.

layout.text: CROWN/ARMOR is an antiviral barrier spray that is made up of natural ingredients that are not only safe to use, but when in formulation, have been researched and tested to create a 99.9% effective barrier against virus transmission.
